price: Such was Our way with the messengers We sent before you, and you will find no change in Our way.
arabic: سُنَّةَ مَن قَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا قَبۡلَكَ مِن رُّسُلِنَاۖ وَلَا تَجِدُ لِسُنَّتِنَا تَحۡوِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
